so_10616417: mkdir /tmp/from-customer
tar xzf to-you.tar.gz -C /tmp/from-customer
gdb /path/to/binary
(gdb) set solib-absolute-prefix /tmp/from-customer

(gdb) where      # Get meaningful stack trace!

Top-3 Similar Questions: so_15413264: Pause Code Execution in Linux Kernel

Explanations about Options.-g:
Produce debugging information in the operating system's native format (stabs, COFF,
 XCOFF, or DWARF). GDB can work with this debugging information.
Explanations about Options.-c:
If any of these options is used, then the linker is not run, and object file names
 should not be used as arguments.
Explanations about Options.-o:
Place output in file file. This applies to whatever sort of output is being produced,
 whether it be an executable file, an object file, an assembler file or preprocessed C
 code.
